channel.title: Official Dragonlance Movie Site
channel.description: Latest news from the official Dragonlance movie site.

item.title: Movie Soundtrack Available 13 May
item.description: Karl Preusser has let us know that the soundtrack for the film will be available from mid-May.

item.title: A Few International Release Dates Announced
item.description: We've got release dates for a few international territories for you.

item.title: R.I.P. Gary Gygax
item.description: The co-father of Dungeons & Dragons (which laid the ground for Dragonlance to be born) has died at the age of 69. The BBC has the full story.

item.title: Official Release Date and Cover Art Announced
item.description: The release date and DVD box art have been announced.

item.title: ... And Here it is, the first trailer!
item.description: You will have clicked already so we're not going to bother writing anything here ;-]

item.title: Dragons of Autumn Twilight Gets PG-13 Rating
item.description: The Motion Picture Association of America (MPAA) has given the up-coming Dragonlance animated movie, Dragons of Autumn Twilight, a PG-13 rating.

item.title: Featurette -- Music of the Lance
item.description: Laura Hickman presents this 5 minute featurette on Karl Preusser's music for the animated feature film, Dragons of Autumn Twilight. Includes a sneak peek at the main title theme for the movie!

item.title: Sneak Peek -- Karl Preusser's 'Qualinesti Hymn'
item.description: Tracy Hickman prepared this sneak peek of Karl Preusser's music for GenCon and DragonCon.

item.title: Tracy Hickman Pens Lyrics for Movie Music
item.description: A sneak peak at some lyrics written by Tracy Hickman for Karl Preusser's film score.

item.title: Karl Preusser Production Journal Entry
item.description: In this month's production journal, composer Karl Preusser provides an insight into his approach to composing the music for the film.

item.title: First Look -- Production Screenshots!
item.description: After a rather long break we're finally able to bring you some new images...

item.title: New Images Released!
item.description: Backgrounds for the Xak Tsaroth treasure room and the Forestmaster's Glade have been released, plus a 3D draconian.

item.title: Interview: Screenwriter, George Strayton
item.description: George Strayton discusses his introduction to Dragonlance, becoming involved with the project, and the challenges of adapting Dragons of Autumn Twilight for the screen in an interview with DLMS Editor Benjamin Craig.

item.title: Backgrounds for Xak Tsaroth / Qualinost
item.description: A couple of new images are available showing colour background artwork for Xak Tsaroth and Qualinost.

item.title: Will Meugniot Production Journal Entry
item.description: In this month's production journal, Will Meugniot provides a snapshot of the day in the life of the director of an animated feature film.

item.title: Composer Karl Preusser to Score Dragonlance Movie
item.description: We're excited to announce that Karl Preusser will join the Dragonlance movie team and take charge of composing the film's score.

item.title: December Update on Movie News
item.description: If you're a DLMS regular you've probably noticed that since July's official announcement things have been pretty quiet on the movie news front.

item.title: More Concept Artwork
item.description: New concept artwork is available for the characters of Laurana, Riverwind, and Pyros.

item.title: Early Character Concept Artwork
item.description: Although it's still early days yet in the production process, we`re extremely excitied to be able to bring you a couple of piece of early character concept art from the film!

item.title: Kiefer Sutherland Headlines Final Movie Cast
item.description: Casing for the movie has now been completed with Kiefer Sutherland assuming voicing duties for Raistlin Majere.

item.title: Ladies and Gentlemen, We Have a Movie!
item.description: OK. So it's been one of the worst kept secrets over the past few months that there's an animated Dragonlance movie in the works.
